description: Floor of arithmetic-geometric mean of n and 2n.
references: Mohammad K. Azarian, AM - GM Strikes Again, Problem 451, College Mathematics Journal, Vol. 22, No. 3, May 1991, p. 255.  Solution published in Vol. 23, No. 3, May 1992, pp. 248-249.
Mohammad K. Azarian, An Application of the Inequality on the Means, Problem B-635, Fibonacci Quarterly, Vol. 27, No. 1, Feb. 1989, p.87.  Solution published in Vol. 28, No. 1, Feb. 1990, pp. 86-87.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) v=[]; for(n=0,120,v=concat(v,floor(agm(n,2*n)))); v(PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b062005.txt", n, " ", floor(agm(n, 2*n))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 26 2001
extensions: Terms corrected by removing spurious commas and a term added by _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 29 2009
